alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 8:25PM EDT until August 03 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Laurens County in central Georgia... Emanuel County in east central Georgia... Central Dodge County in central Georgia... Treutlen County in east central Georgia... Central Johnson County in east central Georgia... Northwestern Wheeler County in central Georgia... Northern Montgomery County in central Georgia... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 825 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spann to Orianna to near Lowery to near Eastman, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Eastman, Soperton, Alamo, Wrightsville, Twin City, Glenwood, Adrian, Stillmore, Cadwell, Oak Park, Chauncey, Rentz, Nunez, Tarrytown, Kite, Dubois, Spann, Lothair, and Plainfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Treutlen; Wheeler
